creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bald man wearing tan and red robes seated on a green cow-like animal at left; standing man in tan robes attends animal with a red staff; two other standing figures at left--one bearded man wearing a gold headdress, carrying a bundle on his back and leaning on a crutch-like staff, and the other carrying a vessel wrapped in a red patterned cloth in his PL hand, with a red staff over his PR shoulder
title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
